parameters.name: EndTimestamp
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify a UNIX timestamp.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace ID. You can obtain the namespace ID on the **Namespace** page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. This parameter is required only for a special third party.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: StartTimestamp
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify a UNIX timestamp.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the job instance. Valid values:

1: The job instance is pending. 3: The job instance is running. 4: The job instance is run. 5: The job instance fails. 9: The request for running the job instance is rejected. To specify this parameter, you must declare the following enumeration class: com.alibaba.schedulerx.common.domain.InstanceStatus.
